items.title: Trump’s tariffs are headed for a constitutional showdown at the Supreme Court that could reshape presidential power for decades
items.description: The Trump administration appealed a ruling by a federal trade court invalidating many of the president’s recent tariffs.

items.title: Trump doubles steel tariffs to 50%
items.description: Trump said U.S. Steel will stay an American company under a deal for Japan-based Nippon to invest in the iconic American steelmaker.

items.title: Elon Musk just had his last day with DOGE, which he says became a ‘scapegoat’ for government cuts
items.description: President Trump honored the Tesla CEO with a farewell press conference in the Oval Office on Friday.

items.title: Stocks flat after Trump says China ‘totally violated’ trade agreement with U.S.
items.description: The U.S. and China had previously agreed to a 90-day pause in which both countries would ratchet down reciprocal tariffs.

items.title: There are 500,000 more people selling their homes in the U.S. than those looking to buy them
items.description: Still, the median home price jumped 1.6% YoY last month and is sitting at $431,931.
